PlaceholderDesc_ScribanLanguage: Scriban offers a large range of features. You can use if expressions, loops, objects, functions and a lot more. Details can be found in the Scriban documentation
PlaceholderDesc_ScribanBuiltins: Scriban includes a lot of builtin functions to help you transform your values and do other operations. These functions can be found in the Scriban documentation
PlaceholderDesc_Include: Loads the include template with the name <TemplateName> and includes it in the template. The name is case-sensitive. The include template must be created in the export area. This can be useful to develop central util functions reuse them in many templates for example.
